reviews.headline: Terrific!
reviews.comments: These are really good inexpensive gloves.  I used them for sheet metal fab work.  The coating on the gloves doesn't wear out.  Like ever.  The fabric back-of-the-hand  will eventually develop holes and wear out, but the fingers and palms stay good for a long time.  I wear the same pair for 2-3 months, for probably 4 hours a day every day.  Great dexterity...I can feel the burr on the edge of a thin sheet of metal, and can pick up small items (rivets, machine screws ,etc.) without having to take them off.  Also I can manipulate my phone screen without taking them off.  A+.

name: Series 2000 Tool Box, Plastic, Black/Yellow, 19 in W x 10-1/4 in D x 10 in H
description: This Stanley 19"W Plastic, Black, Yellow Portable Tool Box is the perfect solution for keeping your tools organised. You will be able to carry your tools around with ease. The portable tool box has a soft, wide rubber-coated handle which allows for easy and comfortable grip. It also has two lid organizers that can store small parts without having to open the tool box. This black and yellow tool box is made of plastic with a nickel plated metal latch that helps keep contents secure. Its 1,085 cu in storage capacity means there is ample space in this tool box for all your tools. The Stanley 19"W Portable Tool Box is the perfect companion for your next project.

specifications.Features: 2/3 Tote Tray, Built-In Pad Lock Eye for Small Locks Helps Keep Contents Secure, Nickel-Plated Metal Latch, Soft, Wide Rubber-Coated Handle Allows for Easy and Comfortable Grip, Two Lid Organizers for Small Parts Storage - Accessible Without Opening the Tool Box

name: General Purpose Double Latch Tool Box with Tray, Steel, Red, 20" W x 8.5" D x 9.5" H
description: The PROTO - J9975R is a robust tool box constructed from steel, designed to provide secure and organized storage for your tools. This individual tool box offers a generous storage capacity of 2,133 cubic inches, allowing you to accommodate a variety of tools and building materials. The toolbox features a padlockable locking system for added security against unauthorized access. It's equipped with a folding top handle that facilitates easy carrying and access.Key Features:• Constructed from durable steel material which enhances its longevity.• Offers ample storage space with an impressive capacity of 2,133 cubic inches.• Equipped with two compartments for better organization of your tools.• Features removable steel tote tray enhancing its usability and convenience.• Designed with a folding top handle for ease in carrying and accessing the toolbox.• Includes one removable tote tray offering flexibility in storage layout.

specifications.Interior Dimensions: 19 3/4 in W x 8 1/4 in D x 9 1/4 in H
specifications.Part of a Modular System: Not Part of a Modular System

reviews.headline: This is a great tool box Made in USA!
reviews.comments: I bought the for my daughter as a first tool box with some money from my Dad after he passed away. It is a great tool box and I was so glad I could get one for her that is Made in USA.

reviews.headline: Strong metal tool box
reviews.comments: The two latch lid is very sturdy. And the lower profile works great for putting in side box on our sprayers.

reviews.headline: Better than the discount brand, but not perfect.
reviews.comments: I bought a box similar to this at a discount tool store locally. I found that one of the latches was defective and did not close all the way. Thought this one would be better quality, thought quite a bit more expensive. I plan to store lithium batteries in it for protection against fire. This box is a somewhat heavier gauge than the discount one. The latches are a bit heavier too. I like the hasp in the middle, I will put a carabiner in it for extra strength. I was a bit disappointed that this one appears to have a plastic handle. Hope is has some steel reinforcing in it. The discount one has a steel handle. The recesses in the ends of this box are not as deep as the discount one, so aren't quite as secure to grab when lifting. Steel tool boxes aren't as common as they used to be -- mostly plastic these days. Steel is essential for storing potentially flammable lithium batteries. The ultimate solution is the Bat-Safe line, but they are extremely expensive. This is a good compromise.

reviews.headline: Great tool box
reviews.comments: Great all metal tool box; sturdy; should last a long time for our application

reviews.headline: A tool box that is a great camera bag!
reviews.comments: I have a Nikon D850, which, with lenses and accessories is a chunk of money.  Recently, I decided to get back into 3D still photography, and I had a Nikon D610 in storage, which I decided to use, but it needed a lens.  So, I purchased a lens, got all the accessories I needed out of storage, but then I had to decide what to use to carry all this expensive equipment. Most of my life I've used Lowepro shoulder and hand carry soft bags. First, the interiors are dust generators (a great enemy of cameras), they don't offer a great deal of protection, and they get more and more expensive. I bought 2 of these Proto boxes (one for each camera system), and they are perfect.  A soft bag to hold what these boxes hold would've cost 3 times as much.  I don't have the dust problem and my equipment is completely safe, and easy to carry. I've worked in a local metal fab shop since 1976, and we would be hard pressed to build and paint a box as beautifully crafted as these Proto boxes, for many times the price.  My hat's off to Proto. These boxes are well designed and beautifully crafted and powder coated. As one other customer has said, 'just like the good old days.'

reviews.headline: High Quality Toolbox
reviews.comments: This toolbox is well constructed, just like the ones you could buy 30 years ago, and should last well past the normal lifespan of today's typical toolbox. Excellent buy! #sweepstakes
